settings.heading: We’re on a mission to help you sleep better
settings.content:
Taking the first step toward better sleep can feel overwhelming.

At Smart Nora, we spend a lot of time thinking about how to improve people’s sleep. That’s why we’ve developed the most advanced and effective snoring solutions available today.

We’re confident that even small changes can significantly improve your sleep quality, which is why we’re offering a free 30-day supply of nose strips and an expert guide to help you get started.

Better sleep is the foundation of better health. This offer is our way of helping you take the first step toward a more restful night.

Join us on the journey to better nights and healthier days.

settings.heading: Get results overnight
settings.description: Follow our comprehensive guide and you’ll experience improved breathing, reduced snoring, and increased energy. Our nasal strips support your every breath, helping you (and your partner!) sleep through the night.
settings.content_1: Support your nervous system and sleep cycle so you can fully recharge and be ready for the day.
settings.content_3:
Alongside our nose strips, the guide will
take you through simple but powerful steps
to improve your sleep:
settings.mob_bot_text: By following this 30-day plan, you’ll experience improved breathing, reduced snoring, and increased energy throughout your day.

settings.content: I have recommended Nora to several of my patients who snore heavily and in less than two weeks it has made an impressive difference in their lives.
settings.title: Dr. Stephanie Hartselle, MD

settings.content: Our validation study revealed that Smart Nora can help both snorers and their partners in getting better sleep. It was striking that people really loved the product.
settings.title: Dr. Roy Raymann, PhD

settings.content: Smart Nora has provided an easily accessible, comfortable solution to address snoring and improve sleep quality for snorers and their partners. I have seen tremendous benefit among my patients who use it.
settings.title: Dr. Janet K. Kennedy, PhD
settings.designation: Clinical Psychologist and founder of NYC Sleep Doctor

settings.content: Nora does the work for you. You don’t have to wake up to adjust your pillow. Nora inflates or deflates it, while you continue to rest comfortably. You don’t have to do anything.
settings.title: Dr. ChrisWinter, MD
settings.designation: Neurologist, Sleep Specialist, Author of The Sleep Solution

settings.heading:
We’ve improved over
 37 million nights of sleep.
settings.title: Doctor Recommended
It has been AMAZING.
settings.content: We have had this device for almost 6 months now. It has been AMAZING at keeping my husband from snoring me awake all night long! He says it doesn’t interrupt his sleep and he finds it comfortable. Worth the price tag for the sleep improvement.

settings.title: It has been a god send!
settings.content: My husband ordered Smart Nora over a year ago, and it has been a god send. It made such a difference in both of us getting a better night's sleep - me because of the quiet, him because I don't have to hit him in the middle of the night any longer!

settings.title: This product works!
settings.content: I've been using this for more than 2 months now and I no longer keep/wake up my partner with snoring and I also have better deep and REM sleep.

settings.title: Really happy with it.
settings.content: A friend recommended the Sleep Nora and I can 100% tell a difference when I use it. My wife can tell the difference as well, I sleep without snoring, I don't wake her up or myself up and I can snore like a freight train. The system is small enough to fit into a carry on bag to travel with, or a small tote bag. I take it everywhere now.

settings.title: Smart Nora really works!
settings.content: This thing is a lifesaver. Not only does it help me sleep better but it also helps my wife sleep better. After I started to use the Smart Nora we both get a full night's rest. It's easy to set up and use and you will notice a difference within a week. Well with the money!

settings.title: We both love Smart Nora, I wouldn’t want to be without it.
settings.content: My wife started getting a much better night’s sleep, and to my surprise, so did I. I felt much more rested. Smart Nora packs up nicely for travel and has been with us on every trip over the past 5 years. We both love it; it really works for me, and I wouldn’t want to be without it.

settings.title: This thing works! It’s magic!
settings.content: Before the Smart Nora my husband and I have slept in deferent bedrooms for at least the past 5 years. I was convinced there was nothing that would work to help reduce his snoring. UNTIL WE FOUND SMART NORA! This thing works! It’s magic! Would 100% recommend this thing to anyone with a snoring spouse.

settings.title: All in all a fantastic product!
settings.content: I’ve been using the Smart Nora for about a month now and according to my wife, it has drastically decreased my snoring. We were very excited about this product because I tried a mouth guard made for snoring once and woke up in the middle of the night choking on it. All in all a fantastic product! It’s been a game-changer for us.

settings.title: My marriage is better for it!
settings.content: I have been using this product for a few years now because of my severe snoring. My wife was at her wit’s end until she discovered this product. And now we can both sleep through the night— her without my snoring and me without being poked in the side! Also, use the controls to adjust as necessary - they make a difference. It is a part of my life and my marriage is better for it!

settings.title: This was definitelyworth the try.
settings.content: This was definitely worth the try. Smart Nora quickly adjusts my husband’s head position to lower or eliminate his snoring, so that I can fall asleep much quicker. The great thing is this has several settings to “ listen” if you will, for your snoring partner and then start to work quickly once it “ hears” the first signs of snoring.

settings.title: Love how quiet the unit is.
settings.content: I have been a Smart Nora Customer since the 2018 Kickstarter days and recently purchased a new unit. This device has been a complete game changer for me, but more importantly, for my Wife. The Nora has worked really well for us. Love how quiet the unit is, how consistent it works, and the fact It helps us (but mostly my wife) get better rest.

settings.title: It actually works!
settings.content: I’ve been a heavy snorer for years, pushing my wife to her limit. After trying other solutions, I got a second-hand Smart Nora, and surprisingly, it actually works! My wife says it’s solved the problem—she’s had the best sleep of our marriage this past month. Another perk: it packs neatly into a small case, making it easy to travel with. Thank you, Smart Nora!

settings.title: Both of us are better rested.
settings.content: My husband and I were sleeping in separate rooms and now we can sleep in the same bed again. Both of us are better rested. This was worth the investment.

settings.title: Setup is very easyand easy to use.
settings.content: I have been using Smart Nora for over one and a half years and has reduced my snoring. Nora hears this then it starts slowly raising the pillow. Setup is very easy and easy to use. The cost is very reasonable, especially if you love your wife and she can sleep without taking from your snoring.

settings.title: The device is really quiet and lives up to all the hype.
settings.content: We have had our first Smart Nora for at least a year for my wife, and I have managed to consistently get a good night's sleep, since then. The device is really quiet and lives up to all the hype. We have now ordered a second Smart Nora for Travel. Thanks, Smart Nora.

settings.title: Happy wife, happy life.
settings.content: After my wife got upset over my snoring, I found Smart Nora online and decided to give it a try. After reading multiple reviews, I ordered one—though I was hesitant to believe it would work. It’s been so effective that my wife says she barely hears me snore; it senses my sound and gently moves my head, stopping the snoring. Happy wife, happy life!

settings.title: It works!
settings.content: I was very skeptical about this product, but I have to say it works! I’ve been using one for several years and recently bought a second one for our vacation home, so I don’t have to travel with it anymore. If you’re considering it and the price tag gives you pause, trust me it’s worth the money, and you have 30 days to try it. I guarantee you’ll love it!

settings.title: Smart Nora has helpedsave my marriage.
settings.content: Love it! Smart Nora has helped save my marriage plus, no mouth or other devices that caused discomfort. Under the pillow Smart Nora gently moves the position of my head and throat to help improve sleep quality.

settings.title: It's super easy to use!
settings.content:
I bought this for my husband about 2 months ago, and it does work.
It lessens his snoring tremendously, to where it doesn’t keep me up or wake me up and we can both rest. It's super easy to use, you charge it and it has levels you can choose. Thank you Nora for making such a great product!!! I recommend it to everyone!

settings.title: Thank you! Thank you!
settings.content: My husband’s snoring got us to the point where we seriously considered sleeping in separate rooms. All the other contraptions were too uncomfortable for him and he would quit using them. It’s been 4 years and your sturdy and well-made product is still working for our relationship and sanity. Thank you.

settings.title: Love the product!
settings.content: Has been a lifesaver as my husband used it and it categorically works every time and I get a good night’s sleep!

settings.title: This thing is genius!
settings.content: My dude snores like two fighting walruses. A friend of ours game him Nora and he tried it last night. This thing is genius. The moment he starts snoring it kicks in and without waking him up gently moves his head and the snoring stops. Wow, it’s a relief for both of us!

settings.title: It actually helped!
settings.content: I was skeptical but I've been using it for about 3 weeks now and sleeping so well and so is my husband! I used to wake him up with my loud snoring and then he couldn't go back to sleep but he's not waking up from my snoring anymore. So thankful for this solution!

settings.title: It is a GAME CHANGER!!
settings.content: For some of you skeptics, we were the biggest, as my husband is an aggressive snorer! We’ve had Nora now for 5 weeks, and with a few easy tweaks to figure out how to keep it in place, it is a GAME CHANGER!!

settings.title: It’s not always the hubby.
settings.content: I am/was the snorer in our house lol. Now he tells me that I am quiet all night and sometimes he even checks on me to see if I’m dead.

settings.title: This thing seriously works.
settings.content: I slept through the night without my husband waking me once. I’ve gotten so used to it that the past week while traveling I couldn't believe how much his snoring woke me up! I may need to figure out how to pack it next time… seriously with it.

settings.title: It retrained me to not snore.
settings.content: I never snored until recently. My wife and I were stressing out. I would wake her and she in turn would wake me. It started to ruin our sleep and put stress on our relationship. She bought the Smart Nora, it literally stopped my snoring through the night. It retrained me to not snore. Thank you.

settings.title: Nora is amazing!
settings.content: My husband’s loud snoring made us both miserable, and I was at the end of my rope. After trying everything, I found Smart Nora. Though skeptical, I bought it, and it completely changed our lives! This product is a must-buy for anyone dealing with snoring—Nora is amazing!

settings.title: Best invention ever!!!
settings.content: My husband literally rattles the bed and he sleeps silently now. I was going crazy from sleep deprivations because of his snoring and now sleep great! It took a couple nights of adjusting the sensor and device in his pillow but highly recommend! Best Money ever Spent.

settings.title: Dear Smart Nora, I love you.
settings.content: For the first time in years, my husband doesn’t snore. Number one product ever. I am a real person, we purchased Nora at full price. It is with every penny. I can finally sleep again. Thank you to whoever invented this product we are SO happy.

settings.heading: More than 100,000 couples get better sleep with Nora.
settings.sub_heading: Let’s hear what they have to say.

settings.heading: Our Story
settings.title: A Revolutionary Step Towards Better Sleep
settings.content:
Smart Nora was born out of necessity. Our family struggled with snoring and we couldn’t find a solution that was both comfortable and effective. Frustrated, we decided to create our own.

As designers and engineers, we developed Nora - a non-invasive solution to improve sleep. We quickly realized millions of others were dealing with the same issue.

Today, over 100,000 customers are sleeping better because of Nora, and we’re just getting started. Our mission is to help the 3.3 billion adults who snore improve their sleep, health, and relationships.

settings.question: What’s included in the Better Sleep Bundle?
settings.description: The bundle includes a 30-day supply of Smart Nora Nose Strips, a comprehensive e-book that teaches you how to optimize your sleep environment, and a 30-day guide to help you try your learning and build lasting habits.

settings.question: How does the 30-day guide in the e-book work?
settings.description: The guide takes you through a daily process to improve your sleep, starting with room optimization, building better sleep habits, and introducing exercises that will help reduce snoring.

settings.question: How can Smart Nora Nose Strips help with snoring?
settings.description: The nose strips work by opening nasal airways, helping reduce snoring due to congestion by improving airflow during sleep.

settings.question: What topics are covered in the e-book?
settings.description: The e-book covers 5 stages: optimizing your sleep environment, managing snoring, daily sleep routine enhancements, breathing techniques, and bonus tips for long-term improvement.

settings.question: Is this offer actually free?
settings.description: Yes, this limited-time offer is free, you are only paying for the shipping cost.

settings.question: Can I reuse the nose strips or continue the 30-day guide after completing it?
settings.description: While the nose strips are disposable, the 30-day guide can be followed repeatedly, and many of our customers continue the practices for long-term benefits.
